nodes.text: Krutch was a gladiator that participated in the brawl in the Cauldron in 22 BBY. He employed all six of his arms for wielding weapons and tools, such as a net and different types of knives. During the fight, he was able to slaughter the reptilian Crockagor in combat. However, he was eventually defeated by Kulltu Kutta.

A noticeable mistake in the episode is that Krutch is seemingly killed twice: first by Kulltu Kutta, and later by Asajj Ventress when she pulls stalactites from the ceiling to crush several gladiators.
